translation.en: I thought they took care of that.
translation.zh: 我还以为已经清理掉了呢

translation.en: What, student body president isn't enough for you?
translation.zh: 卡珊德拉 当学生会主席还嫌不够

translation.en: -Now you're hall monitor, too, Cassandra? -We're on in a minute, Harry.
translation.zh: 现在还当起走廊监督员了？ 我们马上就开场了 哈利

translation.en: -Hmm. -Eighty-five in a row. Beating the record.
translation.zh: 连续85次头像朝上 破纪录了

translation.en: [Cassandra] A new record. Is that as far as you're prepared to go?
translation.zh: 新纪录 你能想到的就是这个吗？

translation.en: -You spun them yourself. -Not a flicker of doubt?
translation.zh: -你自己抛的硬币 -你就一点疑问都没有？

translation.en: I could never ever do that.

translation.zh: 谢谢你 好妹妹 不客气

translation.en: Ooh. Re-gifted flowers for the assistant stage manager?
translation.zh: 你这是把花转送给助理舞台监督吗？

translation.en: The best stage manager in the whole world.
translation.zh: 你是世上最棒的助理舞台监督
威尔今晚表现不错 对吧？

translation.en: [whispers] You should tell him how you feel.
Okay, but don't be late. Guys?
translation.zh: 行 但别迟到 喂 你们几个

translation.en: You need us to bring anything tonight, dude?
translation.zh: 我们需要带什么东西过去吗 老兄？

translation.en: Hey, bring some vodka tonight. It's BYOB.
translation.zh: 喂 今晚带点伏特加来 酒水自备哦
你要在你家办派对吗 哈利？

translation.en: So nice of you to invite everyone.
translation.zh: 你人真好 把大家都叫上了
你恐怕不会去吧 卡珊德拉？

translation.en: Is that really the point, Harry?
translation.zh: 这个是重点吗 哈利？

translation.en: It's not for the play. It's for people who are helping out with prom.
translation.zh: 这不是舞台剧组派对 而是筹备舞会的人一起聚聚

translation.en: But if you want to come...
It's okay. I'll see you tomorrow.
translation.zh: 没关系 我们明天见

translation.en: Oh, by the way, Cassandra, you were really, really great tonight.
translation.zh: 对了 卡珊德拉 你今晚表现得非常棒

translation.en: I'm gonna miss you so much when you go up to Yale.
translation.zh: 你去耶鲁大学之后 我会想死你的
嗯 但我们不会相距太远
但也不会像现在这么近

translation.en: Yeah, you know, on a stage, in an auditorium.
translation.zh: 对 就是在大礼堂里登台演戏

translation.en: For people to come and see.
Did you see this week's check yet?
translation.zh: 这个星期的救济支票来了吗？

translation.en: It was supposed to be here today.
Might be a state budget thing, you know.
translation.zh: 可能和州政府预算有关吧

translation.en: I'm not the goddamn Red Cross.
translation.zh: 我他妈又不是红十字会

translation.en: -[Harry] Hey. -You can't go in there now, Harry.
translation.zh: 嘿 你现在不能进去 哈利

translation.en: What are you two doing here? You need something?
translation.zh: 你们俩怎么来了？有什么事吗？

translation.en: Okay, I have a town meeting in 20 minutes. I'll see you at home after?
translation.zh: 我二十分钟后有市镇会议 我们回家再说？
宾汉姆太太 你没事吧？

translation.en: All we know is, there was a smell, it went away, and now it's back.
translation.zh: 我们唯一知道的是有股怪味出现 消散了一阵子又回来了

translation.en: The committee of selectmen have asked the federal government for help.
translation.zh: 市镇行政委员会已向联邦政府求助

translation.en: The EPA and the Department of the Interior will begin testing this week.
translation.zh: 环保署和内政部将于本周开始测试

translation.en: there's no reason to suspect that this stink poses any health hazard.
translation.zh: 没有理由揣测这股恶臭会危害健康

translation.en: But if anyone wants to use this as a cue to get out of Dodge for the week,
translation.zh: 但如果有谁想去别的地方躲一个星期

translation.en: And, of course, our senior high school,
translation.zh: 当然 至于我镇的高中生

translation.en: kids over the age of 16 are going to be the guest of the National Park Service
translation.zh: 凡年满十六岁者 将在国家公园管理局的带领下

translation.en: who will bus them to the Great Smoky Mountains for a week's camping.
translation.zh: 乘坐大巴前往大雾山露营一周

translation.en: All right, last one for a week. We don't wanna start a forest fire.
translation.zh: 行 最后抽一口 这周就忍忍吧 引发森林大火就麻烦了

translation.en: -[boy] Graffiti. -Yeah, I know it's graffiti, man,
translation.zh: 涂鸦 我知道那是涂鸦 老兄

translation.en: but when was the last time you guys saw graffiti in this town?
translation.zh: 但你们何时在这个镇上看到过涂鸦？

translation.en: It's the writing on the wall.
-[boy] Yeah, no duh. -That's what it's called.
translation.zh: 你这不是废话吗？ 这是一种说法

translation.en: "The writing on the wall"? From the Bible, the Book of Daniel.
translation.zh: 圣经《但以理书》中的不祥之兆

translation.en: -Mene Mene Tekel Upharsin. -Why do you always know shit I don't know?
translation.zh: “弥尼弥尼 提客勒乌法珥新” 你怎么什么屁事都懂？

translation.en: It means, "You've been weighed in the balance and found wanting."
translation.zh: 意思是“你在天平上过称 重量不足”

translation.en: someone was definitely fucking high last night.
translation.zh: 某人昨晚肯定他妈的嗑药嗑嗨了

translation.en: [in sign language] Dad wanted to make sure we brought our toothbrushes, did you...
translation.zh: 爸让我们确认有没有带牙刷 你带了…

translation.en: -It's just a shirt. -Half a shirt. And not for school.
translation.zh: 就是件上衣而已 这是半件上衣吧 不适合上学穿

translation.en: -You have no idea. -Of course I do. I have a mother.
translation.zh: -你根本体会不到 -我当然知道 我也是做女儿的
来抱一个 我们爱你

translation.en: -Um, okay, I'm gonna-- -All right, have fun.
translation.zh: -行了 我该走… -好 玩得开心

translation.en: Do you mind if I, uh, sit here?
Rock slides, the road is closed. You're back home.
translation.zh: 前面塌方封路了 你们到家了

translation.en: doesn't look like anyone was expecting us.
translation.zh: 好像没人知道我们会回来

translation.en: My mom's phone, it just keeps ringing.
translation.zh: 我给我妈打电话 但一直没人接

translation.en: -You're not going to wait for me? -[Campbell chuckles]
Can I crash with you tonight? It's too far back to my place.
translation.zh: 我今晚能睡你家吗？我家离这太远了
别担心 不会有事的

translation.en: Mom, I'm back home. They-- They brought us back.
translation.zh: 妈 我回来了 他们…他们又把我们送回来了

translation.en: -My mom must've left town with my sister. -Same here.
translation.zh: 我妈一定带我妹妹出远门了 我家也没人

translation.en: But their cars are still in the driveway. It's fucking weird.
translation.zh: 但他们的车还在外面 太他妈古怪了
为什么对话框是绿色的？

translation.en: Fuck. I don't think I have any data.
translation.zh: 我操 我手机好像没流量了
没有 谁也联系不上

translation.en: And the storm must have knocked out our data.
translation.zh: 一定是暴风雨把信号中断了

translation.en: Hey, so who decided that we needed a flash mob?
translation.zh: 喂 这是在玩快闪吗？谁召集的？
你他妈搞什么 卡珊德拉？
总比两百个人靠短信沟通强吧

translation.en: Has anyone been able to reach anyone?
translation.zh: 有人成功联系到谁了吗？
肯定有一个很简单的解释

translation.en: And there was a miscommunication, and we were brought back here by mistake.
translation.zh: 由于沟通不良 我们被带回来了 这是一个失误

translation.en: Someone would still answer a phone.
translation.zh: 但起码应该有人会接电话吧

translation.en: I don't know, maybe there's some place with no reception.
translation.zh: 我瞎猜的 说不定他们那里没信号

translation.en: In the morning, someone will answer a phone.
translation.zh: 到了早上 总有人会接电话

translation.en: Maybe it's not safe for us to be here, if they all left.
translation.zh: 那恐怕我们留在这里也不安全 如果其他人都走了的话

translation.en: A couple hours isn't gonna make a difference.
translation.zh: 先等几个小时应该无所谓

translation.en: We'll figure this all out in the morning.
translation.zh: 我们明天早上再弄清情况

translation.en: Yeah, we should go home. And anyone who doesn't want to...
translation.zh: 对 我们得回家了 如果有人不想…

translation.en: uh, be alone can come back to our house. Yeah?
translation.zh: 一个人待着 就到我们家来 好吗？
那就是你的建议吗 卡珊德拉？

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, Harry, yeah. Just go to sleep.
translation.zh: 是的 哈利 你快去睡吧

translation.en: No, I don't care what Cassandra says.
translation.zh: 不 我才不管卡珊德拉怎么说呢
卡珊德拉说的又不一定对

translation.en: I-- Yeah, no, I get that, Gwen,
translation.zh: 不 我懂你意思 格温

translation.en: and maybe your mom and dad would do something like this,
translation.zh: 你爸妈也许能做出这种事来

translation.en: but my mom doesn't leave her house unless you drag her out by her hair and...
translation.zh: 但我妈是那种你得拽着她头发 才会离开家的人…

translation.en: -[sighs] And even then, she-- -You're being paranoid, Lex.
translation.zh: -就算那样 她也… -你别胡思乱想了 莱克丝

translation.en: Your mom left because of the smell, like Cassandra said.
translation.zh: 你妈妈是因为那股怪味才离开的 就像卡珊德拉说的

translation.en: It's the only thing that makes sense.
So, let's just forget about it tonight.
No, no, I'm not gonna go to some party, all right? You go.
translation.zh: 不 我才不去什么派对呢 行了吧？ 要去你去

translation.en: I got to go take a pee.
The whole place is open, man. Just go right here.
translation.zh: 所有地方都关门了 你就地解决吧

translation.en: Who's gonna remember in the morning?
translation.zh: 明早有谁会记得这件事啊？
我操 教堂的门是开着的！
她问你 你他妈有没有搞错？

translation.en: Shut the fuck up. Can you fucking leave?
translation.zh: 给我他妈闭嘴 -你他妈可以滚吗？ -她就是个普通朋友

translation.en: -[Harry] She's just my friend. -[girl] Um, I would, but--
translation.zh: -你他妈可以滚吗？ -她就是个普通朋友 好啊 可是…

translation.en: Hey, Kel. I can explain everything. Kel!
translation.zh: 喂 凯莉 你听我解释 凯莉！

translation.en: [in sign language] I can't sign and shoot.
translation.zh: 我要录像 没空打手语

translation.en: Why don't you ever join in?
translation.zh: 为什么你从来不加入他们？

translation.en: Hey, why are you spoiling all the fun?
translation.zh: 嘿 你怎么这么扫兴啊？

translation.en: Is it like a ballerina thing?

translation.zh: 总是一副很冷淡的样子？

translation.en: Apart from the fact that you were drying her tits?
translation.zh: 你用手擦她的胸还不够我火大吗？
天啊 我他妈去你的

translation.en: I didn't mean anything by it.
You don't mean anything by anything.
translation.zh: 你做的一切都不代表什么

translation.en: I was just trying to have a little bit of fun.
translation.zh: 我就是寻点儿开心而已

translation.en: I mean, it's not like we own each other.
translation.zh: 我们又不是彼此占有的关系

translation.en: No. I mean, you know what I mean.
translation.zh: 不 我是说…你懂我意思吧

translation.en: She doesn't really believe in this kind of thing, you know?
translation.zh: 她不太喜欢玩这些 你懂我意思吗？

translation.en: It's always a lot less fun than you think it's gonna be.
translation.zh: 派对总是没有你想象中的好玩

translation.en: I have a confession to make.
Well, this isn't a Catholic Church. [laughs]
translation.zh: 呃 这又不是天主教堂

translation.en: You can't just do that, you know?
translation.zh: 你要征得同意才行 你懂吗？
你从头到脚我都不喜欢

translation.en: Once it was so cold, my pee froze on the way down.
translation.zh: 有一次天气超冷 我的尿还没着地就被冻住了

translation.en: Oh, I wish I'd been there.
translation.zh: 哇 要是我当时在场就好了

translation.en: [Grizz] The writing on the wall, it's gone.
translation.zh: 墙上的文字 消失了

translation.en: Yeah, of course it is. They cleaned it up.
translation.zh: 这有什么奇怪的 被人清理掉了呗
碍眼的东西都会被清理掉的

translation.en: We're completely cut off from the world.
There's no cable Wi-Fi. Go check your modem.
translation.zh: 这里没有无线网络 不信你去看看你的调制解调器

translation.en: Try your parents' satellite TV. Nothing.
translation.zh: 打开你爸妈的卫星电视看看 什么都没有

translation.en: And you really want to freak yourself out?
translation.zh: 如果你嫌这些还不够毛骨悚然的话

translation.en: It's all fucked up. We can talk to each other, but...
translation.zh: 一切都他妈乱掉了 我们可以互相通话 但是…

translation.en: it's like there's nothing beyond this place.
translation.zh: 这里像是一片荒芜之中的孤岛一样

translation.en: I'll get a car and go to Greenwich to get help.
translation.zh: 我去找辆车 开去格林威治求救

translation.en: Someone has to find out where everyone went.
translation.zh: 总要有人弄清楚大家伙儿的去向
我们总不能全体出动吧
我他妈去你的 卡珊德拉

translation.en: Luke, you want to see if we can get some of the guys to come with?
translation.zh: 卢克 我们去叫几个男生一起去吧？

translation.en: Okay, so as a rule, the more bizarre a thing seems,
translation.zh: 一般而言 一件事情看起来越是古怪

translation.en: -I don't know this shit. -How about Sherlock Holmes?
translation.zh: 我他妈一个字都没听懂 福尔摩斯总知道吧？ 重点是 一切都是可以解释的

translation.en: The point is, there's an explanation for everything.
translation.zh: 福尔摩斯总知道吧？ 重点是 一切都是可以解释的

translation.en: What does that have to do with the Arthur Conan Boyle dude?
translation.zh: 这和阿瑟柯南博尔爵士有什么关系？
是道尔 你真是没救了

translation.en: [Luke] What the fuck is going on?
I mean, there's only so many options.
translation.zh: 我是说 也只有几种可能性
精心设计的操蛋的游戏

translation.en: Like, someone built an exact replica of our town
translation.zh: 有人建造了一个 和我们城镇一模一样的地方

translation.en: and just put in the middle of nowhere, and if we just walk...
translation.zh: 然后把它安放在一片荒野之中 如果我们用走的…

translation.en: like, this way or that way or any way,
translation.zh: 比如往这边 那边 或随便哪个方向走

translation.en: eventually we'll get back to the...
I'm not saying it makes any sense.
translation.zh: 当然 这一切有很多说不通的地方

translation.en: and it came back, and the buses came for us.
translation.zh: 然后又回来了 然后大巴来接我们了

translation.en: You're gonna just work this out, Cassandra?
translation.zh: 卡珊德拉 你是准备用理智把这件事想通吗？
当这是个逻辑问题似的？

translation.en: I mean, not a flicker of a doubt?
The world doesn't just turn upside down without a reason.
translation.zh: 世界秩序不会无缘无故被打破
我们又不是在什么剧中剧里面

translation.en: Okay? Clever is not the same thing as true.
translation.zh: 好吗？自作聪明和真相是两码事

translation.en: There is a point to everything, there are answers.
translation.zh: 一切都是有目的性 有解释的

translation.en: God doesn't just play games with people for fun.
translation.zh: 上帝不会没事把我们耍得团团转

translation.en: All right, look, Grizz and I will get a group together
translation.zh: 这样吧 我和格里兹组织一批人

translation.en: and we'll go hike out here through the woods, okay? Like a search party.
translation.zh: 徒步去树林那边看看如何？ 相当于搜索队

translation.en: I think that's a good idea.

translation.zh: 嗯 没问题 格里兹对这个很在行

translation.en: And if there's people out there, we gotta find 'em, right?
translation.zh: 如果外面有人 我们得找到他们 对吧？

translation.en: Yeah, I got a house with a refrigerator with food inside of it,
translation.zh: 对啊 我有地方住 冰箱里也有吃的

translation.en: and I'm gonna go eat it.

translation.zh: -卢克 -你不能就这么一走了之

translation.en: Well, what are we supposed to do instead?
We have to figure out what is happening to us.
translation.zh: 我们得弄清楚这到底是怎么一回事

translation.en: You're not student council president anymore.
translation.zh: 你再也不是学生会主席了

translation.en: God, you really, really need to get over that.
translation.zh: 天啊 这件事你必须翻篇儿了！

translation.en: Jesus Christ, just get in the car.

translation.zh: -你别招惹她 -去你妈的 威尔
随便你 我他妈才不管呢

translation.en: -Hey, what are you doing? -[car engine starts]
-I'm just gonna send a text. -[shutter clicks]
-Let everybody know how fucked we are. -Campbell!
translation.zh: -告诉大家我们真他妈完蛋了 -坎贝尔！

translation.en: Come on, let's think about this.
translation.zh: 求你了 我们好好想想

translation.en: [woman] Hi, you've reached the office of Amanda Pressman.
translation.zh: 你好 这是阿曼达普雷斯曼的办公室

translation.en: At the sound of the tone, please--
[man] Hi, you've reached Jim Pressman's phone.
translation.zh: 你好 这是吉姆普雷斯曼的手机

translation.en: Please leave a message after the--
I just needed to talk to someone.
translation.zh: 我当时就是想找个人说说话

translation.en: You're really not talking to me?
What I did is not the worst crime in the world,
translation.zh: 我没有犯下什么十恶不赦的罪过吧？

translation.en: and given everything, can't I get a tiny break?
translation.zh: 再加上现在的情况 你就不能宽容一点吗？
不然待会儿全被抢光了

translation.en: [girl] Are you serious? Can I have a bag? No, you can't.
translation.zh: -你有没有搞错？不能给我一袋吗？ -不行

translation.en: -But there's none left, Elle. -That's not my problem.
translation.zh: -可是你全都拿光了 艾尔 -那不关我的事

translation.en: You ever see that movie The Poseidon Adventure?
translation.zh: 你有看过电影《海神号遇险记》吗？

translation.en: It's about a cruise ship and it capsizes,
translation.zh: 讲的是一艘邮轮翻覆失事的故事

translation.en: and the captain, he comes into this big, upside-down ballroom,
translation.zh: 里面的船长跑到已经翻覆的大舞厅里

translation.en: he tells everybody to stay where they are, that they're gonna be rescued.
translation.zh: 让大伙儿留在原地不动 说他们会得救

translation.en: And-- And six of them, they decide to climb up,
translation.zh: 然后有六个人决定往上爬

translation.en: to the bottom of the ship.

translation.zh: 他们中的一些人得以活命

translation.en: And ever since I watched it, I always wondered...
translation.zh: 自从我看了那部电影 我一直在想…

translation.en: You know, like, who am I in this story? Am I the one who has to...
translation.zh: 我会是故事里的哪个人物？ 我会是那个…

translation.en: you know, die so that everyone else lives?
translation.zh: 牺牲自己 让别人活命的人？

translation.en: Am I the one who turns out weaker than expected?
translation.zh: 还是比大家想象中还要懦弱的人？

translation.en: Am I the one who's only doing the best when the going is good?
translation.zh: 还是只有在情况有利时 才会拼尽全力的人？

translation.en: I know I'm not the heroine.
I'm telling you, the one that you are right now...
translation.zh: 我想说的是 从你现在的行为来看

translation.en: you don't want to be that one.

translation.zh: 这玩意儿还真他妈坚不可摧啊

translation.en: Do you have, like, a drug problem or something?
translation.zh: 你是有什么毒瘾药瘾吗？

translation.en: Depends on what you mean by that.

translation.zh: 怎么了？我待会儿给你解释
怎么了？ 你…你的嘴唇
是啊 我流了好多汗

translation.en: Can you take me home? I have to go home.
translation.zh: 你能送我回家吗？我必须得回家

translation.en: Cassandra, what's... What's going on right now?
translation.zh: 卡珊德拉 你…你到底怎么了？

translation.en: I ditched my check-up for this trip.
translation.zh: 我为了这趟旅行取消了去医院检查

translation.en: I don't know where I put my pills.
translation.zh: 我不知道我把药放哪里了

translation.en: -I'm gonna fucking die. -Come on, don't say that.
translation.zh: 我操 这样下去我会死的 喂 别说这种话

translation.en: We'll break into the pharmacy, even if we have to blow it up.
translation.zh: 哪怕把药房给炸了 我们也要闯进去

translation.en: What if things don't go back to the way they were?
translation.zh: 万一这一切都无法恢复原状怎么办？

translation.en: -'Course they're gonna go back the way-- -Don't give me a fucking speech, Gordie.
translation.zh: 肯定会恢复原… 你别他妈瞎保证 戈尔迪
我还装着心脏起搏器呢

translation.en: Look, okay, if it turns out we're stuck here,
translation.zh: 听我说 如果我们真的被困在这儿了
不管这他妈到底什么情况

translation.en: If we can't go back home, if this is our new home, then...
translation.zh: 要是我们回不了家了 如果这是我们的新家 那…

translation.en: then I'll learn how to take care of you.
I can study. There's still a hospital.
translation.zh: 我可以学习知识 这里还有医院

translation.en: You have to stay alive, or else we're all fucked.
translation.zh: 你必须活着 不然我们全他妈完蛋了

translation.en: [Grizz] Okay, so five days' worth of food,
translation.zh: 好 我们有五天的口粮

translation.en: and that should be enough to get us past Greenwich, Stamford,
translation.zh: 应该够我们途经格林威治、斯坦福德

translation.en: and all the way up to New Haven.
-I don't understand. -[Harry] It was my mother's.
translation.zh: 我不明白 这是我妈的

translation.en: -I need to go. -[stammers] She was fucking someone.
translation.zh: -我得走了 -她已经和别人上床了

translation.en: My dad hasn't even been dead six months.
translation.zh: 我爸去世还不到六个月

translation.en: But what does that matter now?
translation.zh: 但现在说这个有什么用？

translation.en: How is finding some shit about our parents going to make things better?
translation.zh: 挖掘我们爸妈的破事儿根本无济于事

translation.en: It was an insurance policy that my father left for me and my sister,
translation.zh: 这是我爸生前留给我和我妹妹的保险

translation.en: in case things go to shit.
translation.zh: 以防遇到什么操蛋的事
谁会在乎金条啊 哈利？

translation.en: All you can do is have an advantage and this is mine,
translation.zh: 最重要的是手握优势 这是我的优势

translation.en: this is the only one that I have. Okay?
translation.zh: 我唯一的优势 好吗？
凯莉 我们得相依为命

translation.en: We don't own each other, remember?
translation.zh: 我们并非彼此占有 记得吗？

translation.en: Why should I trust you today,
translation.zh: 我今天凭什么要相信你？

translation.en: if I couldn't trust you yesterday?
translation.zh: 更何况你昨天已经失信于我了

translation.en: You have to stick with your own.
translation.zh: 我们同病相怜 不能分开

translation.en: It's just a chunk of metal, Harry.
translation.zh: 那只是一块金属而已 哈利

translation.en: I don't think that's gonna matter now.
translation.zh: 对现在的情况一点都不重要

translation.en: -Thank you. -[girl] Who's got the peanut butter?
translation.zh: 谢谢夸奖 花生酱在谁那里？

translation.en: -Is it still in the pack? -I'll get it.
-What the fuck? Fuck! -[girl] What just happened?
-[Emily] Fucking bit me! -[Grizz] Hey, clear the area.
translation.zh: -怎么了？ -我他妈被咬了 喂 大家让让行吗？我们得让她躺下

translation.en: -Would you lie her down? Careful. -[Emily] Shit, shit, shit, shit! Ow!
translation.zh: 喂 大家让让行吗？我们得让她躺下 -该死！真该死！ -小心

translation.en: -[Grizz] All right, just lie her down. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 好 让她躺下 对
往后退 快点 我操
妈的 好痛啊 这…

translation.en: Fucking shit, it hurts so much!
Let's try-- Hey, I'm gonna try to calm you down. All right?
translation.zh: 我来试着让你平静下来 好吗？

translation.en: You wanna slow your heart rate down. So, deep breaths.
translation.zh: 我想让你的心率减缓 做个深呼吸

translation.en: That's good, okay. So, squeeze my hand.
translation.zh: 对 很好 来 捏紧我的手

translation.en: Big squeeze. Think we can get some packs?
translation.zh: 使劲捏 能拿几个书包过来吗？

translation.en: Put it beneath the back of her head, we want her heart above it.
translation.zh: 垫在她头下面 我们得抬高她的心脏

translation.en: Oh, yeah, that's a good-- that's a good bite.
translation.zh: 啊 我看到了 这口子挺深的

translation.en: -Okay. -Is it supposed to hurt this much?
[Luke] Don't worry, Grizz knows what he's doing, all right?
translation.zh: 别担心 格里兹知道该怎么做

translation.en: -Okay, let it out. -[Luke] It's gonna be a badass scar.
translation.zh: -好 我把毒液放出来 -这会留下一个很酷的疤

translation.en: Everybody else all right? You guys good?
translation.zh: 你们还好吗？ 你们没事吧？
拜托你接电话 妈妈

translation.en: If you pick up, I'll explain.
translation.zh: 你接电话 我才能解释给你听

translation.en: So you're not afraid I'm alive.
translation.zh: 免得你害怕 我还活着

translation.en: We just want to be with you at home.
translation.zh: 我们想回家 和你在一起
如果我们的家还在的话

translation.en: You know how you said everyone we go to school with is an asshole?
translation.zh: 你不是说我们学校的人 全是些王八蛋吗？
事实证明 你是对的

translation.en: Well, nobody is feeling well, Cassandra.
translation.zh: 嗯 每个人感觉都不好 卡珊德拉

translation.en: I'm serious. I can't find my medicine.
translation.zh: 我是说真的 我的药找不到了

translation.en: Your medicine's-- Your medicine's in my bag.
Yeah, I took it for you. I thought maybe you'd forgotten it.
translation.zh: 我帮你拿的 我想万一你忘带了呢

translation.en: [Allie] Yeah. Yeah, I'll get it for you.
translation.zh: 不客气 我这就去拿

translation.en: But then you need to get out there and you need to do something,
translation.zh: 然后你得挺身而出 做点什么

translation.en: because there's like a hundred scared-shitless idiots running around.
translation.zh: 因为现在有一百多个 吓得屁滚尿流的蠢蛋在四处乱跑

translation.en: -No one wants to hear anything from me. -Fuck that, Cassandra, you're here.
translation.zh: 没人愿意听我说话 去他们的 卡珊德拉 你不能退缩

translation.en: -Me, too. -And I have to take care of myself.
And I need you take care of me.
I live in your shadow for 17 fucking years...
translation.zh: 十七年来 我他妈一直活在你的阴影之下

translation.en: and now you want to disappear?
translation.zh: 你现在居然想消失就消失？

translation.en: Just go get my medicine, Allie.
Glasberg tried to barbecue in his own room and...
translation.zh: 格莱斯伯格想在房间里烧烤

translation.en: I'd have voted him most likely to do that.
translation.zh: 确实是很像他会做出来的事

translation.en: I don't know where I'm going.
break into a restaurant and steal some food and hang out.
translation.zh: 闯进一家餐馆 偷点吃的打发时间

translation.en: Look, I just want to help.
So what? That's what I want.
Since the day I moved here.
translation.zh: 从我搬到这里的第一天就想要

translation.en: It's not a very good time. In case you haven't noticed,
translation.zh: 现在不是说这个的时候 你没看见整个世界都他妈一团乱吗？

translation.en: -the whole world just turned upside down. -I noticed, okay? Believe me.
translation.zh: 现在不是说这个的时候 你没看见整个世界都他妈一团乱吗？ 我知道好吧？真的

translation.en: Today feels like the first day in my whole life
translation.zh: 今天是我人生中第一次觉得

translation.en: Now what does he have that I don't have?
translation.zh: 现在他有什么是我没有的？

translation.en: We're in Connecticut, man. What the fuck? There's no fucking cobras here.
translation.zh: 这可是康涅狄格州 这他妈什么鬼？ 压根不该有什么破眼镜蛇

translation.en: But we're three hours from anywhere.
translation.zh: 可现在我们去哪里都要走三小时

translation.en: And I have no idea what to...
Fuck. What-- What the fuck does that mean?
translation.zh: 我操 你…你他妈这话什么意思？

translation.en: Her body's shutting down, she's suffocating.
translation.zh: 她的身体在衰竭了 她快窒息了

translation.en: What... I made her do it, dude.
translation.zh: 这… 是我让她来的 老兄

translation.en: You should tell everybody so they're prepared.
translation.zh: 你应该通知大家 让他们有心理准备

translation.en: What the fuck does that mean? Are you giving up, Grizz?
translation.zh: 这他妈什么意思？ 格里兹 你打算放弃了吗？

translation.en: Luke, we're so fucking in over our heads here.
translation.zh: 我们已经他妈的走投无路了
我操 你疯了 老兄

translation.en: H-hey, I don't think she's breathing.
translation.zh: 喂 她好像没有呼吸了 她没有…

translation.en: -I don't think she's-- -Give her mouth-to-mouth, just--
translation.zh: 喂 她好像没有呼吸了 她没有… 做嘴对嘴呼吸

translation.en: -I don't know how to-- Okay! -Just do it, just blow!
translation.zh: -我不会… -别磨蹭了 -使劲吹气！ -好吧
-把她的头抬高 -什么？ -你得把她的头抬高 -堵住她的鼻子

translation.en: -You have to tilt her head back. -[boy] Block her nose.
translation.zh: -你得把她的头抬高 -堵住她的鼻子

translation.en: -Put your fingers over her nose! -Look, I'm doing the best I can!
translation.zh: 用手堵住她的鼻子！ 行了！我已经尽力了！

translation.en: -[boy] I don't know. I don't think so. -[girl] That's not how you do it. Shit.
translation.zh: 不知道 好像没有了 你这样做不对 该死

translation.en: No, you can't do that while I'm doing this! It's not gonna work!
translation.zh: -不 你不能这样！ -怎么了？ 我们同时做是不行的！

translation.en: And now I'm telling you not to, okay?!
Come on, Emily, stay with us. Come on!
translation.zh: 艾米丽 快醒来 快啊！

translation.en: Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
We need to decide whether to bury her here or take her home.
translation.zh: 我们得想想是把她埋在这还是带回去

translation.en: The rest is out of our hands.
No, no, no. Fuck that. No, we can do this. Come on.
translation.zh: 别他妈这么说 我们能行的 加把劲

translation.en: I want to know why we're here.
translation.zh: 我想知道我们为什么会在这里

translation.en: And why this place is exactly like home?
translation.zh: 还有为什么这个地方和家里一模一样

translation.en: And the lights still go on?
[laughs] And our cell phones still work.
translation.zh: 我们的手机也还能运作

translation.en: [in sign language] What if there is no why?
translation.zh: 万一根本没有为什么呢？

translation.en: I mean, there's a story here.
translation.zh: 我是说 这件事是有原因的

translation.en: Apparently they do. You go missing, you go deaf for no reason.
translation.zh: 现在看来 人就是会无缘无故消失 人会失踪 也会失聪 这都毫无理由

translation.en: You're looking for answers.There are none.
translation.zh: 你在寻找答案 但根本没有答案

translation.en: You know what? Something happened yesterday.
translation.zh: 听我说 昨天肯定发生了什么事

translation.en: I have to find out why.
-[Grizz] Need me to take her for a while? -[Luke] No, I'm all right.
translation.zh: 需要我来抱她一程吗？ 不 我没事

translation.en: the writing on the wall from before we left.
translation.zh: 我们出发前看到的墙上文字

translation.en: 'Cause that's exactly how God would do it.
translation.zh: 这倒是很符合上帝的风格

translation.en: I just got a bar of reception.
Just tell her to spread the word,
and have everybody meet at the church.
translation.zh: 召集大伙儿在教堂集合
我们不能再引发更多恐慌了

translation.en: They must be headed back here.
translation.zh: 他们肯定在回来的路上了

translation.en: That's why he wanted us together.
translation.zh: 所以才把我们召集到一起

translation.en: Twelve hours. Maybe they found something.
translation.zh: 才十二个小时 没准他们找到了什么

translation.en: Or maybe they found nothing. Why wouldn't he say if it was good news?
translation.zh: 也可能一无所获 如果是好消息 他早直说了

translation.en: there are some things that we ought to figure out.
translation.zh: 我们需要商议一些事情

translation.en: Before we rip this place apart and maybe...
translation.zh: 免得我们把这地方弄得一团乱 或者…

translation.en: you know, start hurting each other.
I don't know what the hell is going on.
translation.zh: 我不知道到底发生了什么破事儿

translation.en: Maybe Luke will come back with some good news.
translation.zh: 也许卢克会带好消息回来

translation.en: Yeah, why don't we just wait and see, Cassandra?
translation.zh: 不如我们就静观其变吧 卡珊德拉

translation.en: Because I would rather prepare for the worst
translation.zh: 不 因为我宁愿在最坏的情况发生前
你这话什么意思？什么打算?

translation.en: I don't know specifically, but I think it means...
translation.zh: 我也不知道具体是什么 但最起码…

translation.en: we agree not to just take things
translation.zh: 我们应该约定不随便拿东西

translation.en: Until all the food is gone and...
translation.zh: 不然等所有食物都被抢光了

translation.en: Jesus, man, what is your problem?
translation.zh: 喂 老兄 你发什么疯呢？

translation.en: What are we agreeing to, Cassandra?
translation.zh: 我们到底在约定什么 卡珊德拉？

translation.en: Which one of us gets to decide who gets what?
translation.zh: 我们之中谁有权决定谁该拿什么?

translation.en: How do you want to decide things?
Every person for themselves? Then we're back to where we started.
translation.zh: 如果人人只想自己 我们又回到原点

translation.en: Maybe you want to flip a coin to see who decides?
translation.zh: 还是你想靠掷硬币来看谁有权决定？
随机碰运气你他妈总喜欢了吧？
你选一面吧 哈利 选啊

translation.en: -I'm-- I'm not gonna do that. -Okay, okay.

translation.zh: 命运掌握在我们自己手中

translation.en: There's no civilization here, not until we start one.
translation.zh: 这里没有文明 除非我们建立文明

translation.en: So what are we gonna do?
First, I think we have no choice but to share.
translation.zh: 首先 我认为我们必须分享
分享食物 分享资源

translation.en: Really? How much electricity do we have?
translation.zh: 你是认真的吗？我们还有多少电力？

translation.en: Until it's all used up and everything goes dark?
translation.zh: 一旦耗尽 这里将是一片漆黑

translation.en: I think 225 people in 200 houses doesn't make sense.
[Cassandra] What is yours? Do you have money?
The things that you need to live:
food, clothes, the stuff in stores,
translation.zh: 食物、衣服、商店里的东西

translation.en: Are we going to fight each other over food?
translation.zh: 难道我们要为了食物大打一架吗？

translation.en: And some of us have things that others want.
translation.zh: 我们中有些人有其他人想要的东西
对吧 威尔？比如住的地方

translation.en: Right, Harry. I have no house.
translation.zh: 没错 哈利 我是没地方住

translation.en: The place that I used to live in
is outside of town, it doesn't exist.
translation.zh: 在城镇边界之外 现在根本不存在了

translation.en: You want me to just live on the streets?
translation.zh: 你是想让我露宿街头吗？

translation.en: You can live wherever you want.
I don't have to listen to this. Not anymore.
translation.zh: 我听不下去了 我走了

translation.en: Harry, this has nothing to do with you--
translation.zh: 哈利 这不是在针对你…

translation.en: No one elected you king, cousin.
translation.zh: 没有人选你当王 表姐

translation.en: Did anybody vote for her? Did they?
translation.zh: 有人给她投票吗？ 有吗？

translation.en: Anybody elect her to speak on your behalf?
translation.zh: 有人选她作为代表发言吗？

translation.en: I don't want to be king.
That's not what it looks like.
translation.zh: 但事实看上去并非如此

translation.en: I've thought a lot about dying.
I've almost gotten used to that.
But I don't like to be afraid.
translation.zh: 但是我不喜欢恐惧的感觉
那你他妈尽管朝我开枪

translation.en: I don't want to shoot you.

translation.zh: 我就是想引起大家的注意而已
这个会议显然开不下去了

translation.en: We'll be back when Luke gets here.
translation.zh: 等卢克回来了 我们再聚

translation.en: Until then, if anybody else is tired of listening to her,
translation.zh: 在那之前 如果有人和我一样厌倦了听她说话

translation.en: She died from a snake bite.
translation.zh: 她被蛇咬了 然后死了

translation.en: Her whole body just shut down.
translation.zh: 她的整个身体都衰竭了

translation.en: We did everything we could, but we couldn't save her.
translation.zh: 我们竭尽全力 但还是无力回天

translation.en: So we're gonna bury her tomorrow.
translation.zh: 所以我们明天就把她埋了

translation.en: [Grizz] So, I'm gonna need a couple of guys.
translation.zh: 所以我需要几个男生帮忙
各位 外面什么都没有

translation.en: just woods that go on forever.
[in sign language] It's my house, too.
I never had just one day that was mine, until now.
translation.zh: 我就没过过一天属于我的日子 直到现在

translation.en: All right, give me the key,
[whispers] Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death,
translation.zh: “就算我经过死亡阴暗的幽谷

translation.en: I will fear no evil for thou art with me.
translation.zh: 我也不怕遭害 因为你与我同在

translation.en: Thy rod and thy staff, they comfort me. My cup runneth over.
translation.zh: 你的杖、你的竿安慰我 我的福杯满溢”
